scriptLines:
query: '<fetch>
  <entity name='etl007_columnmap'>
    <attribute name='etl007_sourcecolumnidname' />
    <attribute name='etl007_targetcolumnidname' />
    <link-entity name='etl007_column' to='etl007_sourcecolumnid' from='etl007_columnid' alias='etl007_column' link-type='inner' />
  </entity>
</fetch>') ~> etlreposrc
